rows.label: tlk45300143_01_msg0001
rows.name:
This is a training ground for
mercenaries who don't have a
mission to attend to.

rows.label: tlk45300143_01_msg0002
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Once a foe's been Toppled,
you Launch that sucker!

rows.label: tlk45300143_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Then focus your attacks to deal
massive damage!

rows.label: tlk45300143_01_msg0004
rows.name:
For the finishing blow,
Smash 'em to the ground!

rows.label: tlk45300143_01_msg0005
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling ]That's what I teach 'em, but they're
not always too quick on the uptake.

rows.label: tlk45300143_01_msg0006
rows.name:
It's tough to link up attacks like that on
your own, so you gotta work with your
allies. Takes 'em a while to realize that.
